text: Richard Duke Buchan III (born July 3, 1963) is an American entrepreneur, financier, farmer, and philanthropist. He is the founder and CEO of Hunter Global Investors, a private investment management firm. Buchan was the United States Ambassador to Spain and Andorra from 2018 until 2020. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Spain Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Philanthropists from North Carolina
title: Duke Buchan
